heading: HR00240
0: RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON AGRICULTURE OF THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, INTO THE IMPLEMENTATION OF REPUBLIC ACT NO. 11203, ENTITLED "AN ACT LIBERALIZING THE IMPORTATION, EXPORTATION AND TRADING OF RICE, LIFTING FOR THE PURPOSE THE QUANTITATIVE IMPORT RESTRICTION ON RICE, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES," TO ASCERTAIN THAT GOVERNMENT AGENCIES AND INSTRUMENTALITIES CONCERNED ARE PERFORMING THEIR RESPECTIVE DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES, SPECIALLY INTO THE UTILIZATION OF THE RICE COMPETITIVENESS ENHANCEMENT FUND
status: Pending with the Committee on AGRICULTURE AND FOOD since 2019-11-27
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00240
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON AGRICULTURE OF THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, INTO THE IMPLEMENTATION OF REPUBLIC ACT NO. 11203, ENTITLED "AN ACT LIBERALIZING THE IMPORTATION, EXPORTATION AND TRADING OF RICE, LIFTING FOR THE PURPOSE THE QUANTITATIVE IMPORT RESTRICTION ON RICE, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES," TO ASCERTAIN THAT GOVERNMENT AGENCIES AND INSTRUMENTALITIES CONCERNED ARE PERFORMING THEIR RESPECTIVE DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES, SPECIALLY INTO THE UTILIZATION OF THE RICE COMPETITIVENESS ENHANCEMENT FUND
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : SUANSING, ESTRELLITA B.
DATE FILED : 2019-08-15
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON AGRICULTURE AND FOOD ON 2019-11-27
PREVIOUS COMMITTEE REFERRALS :PRIMARILY REFERRED TO RULES on 2019-08-27;
